name: callbacks
description: Adjust is a mobile attribution service, sort of Google Analytics for the mobile world. Adjust sends back callbacks with information (attribution) about every mobile install, like where this install comes from, which link a person clicked before installing the app.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique ID of an Adjust callback.

columns.name: tracker
columns.description: Adjust’s tracker parameter. For example https://app.adjust.com/gxel3d1.

columns.name: campaign_name
columns.description: The value of campaign paramenter in Adjust URL.

columns.name: adgroup_name
columns.description: The value of adgroup paramenter in Adjust URL.

columns.name: creative_name
columns.description: The value of creative paramenter in Adjust URL.

columns.name: label
columns.description: The value of label paramenter in Adjust URL.

columns.name: device_name
columns.description: Model and OS version of a user’s device.

columns.name: app_version
columns.description: Bindle’s app version at the moment.

columns.name: activity_kind
columns.description: Predefined Adjust event, could be click, install, event (means custom event and event_name will be present) or else.

columns.name: event_name
columns.description: Custom Adjust event; Bindle has custom signup event.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: ID of a user (from users table). Present for signup event.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country derived from user’s IP address.
